parameters.name: AppConfig
parameters.description: The application configurations in the JSON format. This parameter is deprecated.

parameters.name: AutoRestart
parameters.description: Specifies whether to restart the application the next day. Valid values: true and false.

parameters.name: BackendServiceTraceRegion
parameters.description: The region where the backend application is deployed. This parameter is used in end-to-end tracing scenarios.

parameters.name: BonreeSDKConfigJson
parameters.description: The collection configurations of the mobile SDK. You can enable or disable collection configurations based on the app version.

parameters.name: IsSubscribe
parameters.description: Specifies whether you want to subscribe to the application. Valid values: true and false.

parameters.name: RealRegionId
parameters.description: The region where the application resides. You can leave this parameter empty or set it to China East 2 Finance.

parameters.name: Restart
parameters.description: Specifies whether to restart the application. Valid values: true and false.

parameters.name: ServiceDomainOperationJson
parameters.description: The service domain name of the application. You can create, modify, and delete service domain name configurations.

parameters.name: Stop
parameters.description: Specifies whether to stop the application. Valid values: true and false.
